info.title: Tarot Bot API
info.description: Everything you need for digital Tarot readings

parameters.name: deck
parameters.description: Bit mask or string representation of subset of deck. Used to limit deck to major or minor arcana only, or remove cards from the deck as they’re drawn.

parameters.name: reverseChance
parameters.description: Percent chance the card will be reversed. Default 0.5

parameters.name: images
parameters.description: The (encoded uri component) url of a formatted json file with urls or string keyword of a preexisting deck for card images and descriptions. rws, rider-waite, rider-waite-smith return Rider Waite Smith deck; tarotbot, tb return Tarot Bot deck. Default rws

get.description: Returns a unique Tarot Card for the given date

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The day the returned card will represent in MMDDYYYY format. Default today

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The date to start counting back from, combines with offset. Default today

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of daily readings to return. Default 100, max 10000

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of days in the past from the start date to count back from. Default 0

get.description: Returns multiple random cards in the defined arrangement. EXPERIMENTAL (please be gentle)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The numerical dimensions (ie 900,530) and card positions (ie 300,0) describing the arrangement or a string keyword of a preexisting arrangement. Note: a card’s default dimensions are 300x530. Example: pastpresentfuture is identical to 900,530,0,0,300,0,600,0. Default pastpresentfuture

parameters.name: images
parameters.description: The (encoded uri component) url of a formatted json file with urls for card images. Used to change the images that tarot bot returns

parameters.name: reversed
parameters.description: Return card as reversed. Default false
